source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: SketchUp + Photoshop: Digital Watercolor Renderings in 3 Hrs

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.name: Adam
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop

items.headline: Render your SketchUp models quickly and with a great digital watercolor technique using a SketchUp to Photoshop workflow
objectives_summary: Be able to quickly create compelling architectural illustrations using only SketchUp & Photoshop.
The instructor will show not only show you how to use these techniques, but explain why to use them - giving you a deep understanding of the illustration process.
Use the provided SketchUp file or follow along with your 3d model to create a "digital watercolor" in just a few hours.

items.title: Blender 2.79- Character creation for unity for beginners
items.headline: Start modeling, animation with Blender and integrate your character in Unity
objectives_summary: Discover the basics of polygonal modeling in Blender
Learn how to texture a 3D object in Blender using simple techniques
Acquire rigging and animation basics with dedicated Blender tools

items.title: The Ultimate Blender Low Poly Course 2
items.headline: Learn Low Poly Modeling & Animation!
objectives_summary: Students will learn about low poly modeling, scene creation, rigging and animating
Students will learn about compositing and all the different tools in Blender that one would need to create some low poly scenes and animations

items.title: Blender Unleashed: Mastering Subdivision Surface Modeling
items.headline: Master the art of building highly detailed models in Blender using subdivision surface modeling techniques.
objectives_summary: Model using basic to intermediate subdivision surface modeling techniques
Create complex geometrical forms using procedural mesh modeling techniques with Blender's deform modifiers

items.title: 3ds max and V-ray for architect. Advanced  3d visualisation
items.headline: How to make a photo-realistic 3d visualization exteriors for several hours . Learn all the secrets of settings V-ray
objectives_summary: Make photorealistic exterior renders
Become professional 3d visualizer
will be a professional 3ds max and vray user

items.title: After Effects : Learn Minimal typography and logo opener
items.headline: A Comprehensive course for Typography and logo animation in Adobe After Effects
objectives_summary: Motion Graphics for logo and titles

items.title: Medical Imaging, 3D Modelling and 3D Printing - Beginners
items.headline: Lay your strong foundations for extracting Patient Specific 3D Anatomies from DICOM Data and 3D Printing in Healthcare
objectives_summary: Fill in your details on our course page on our website anatomiz3d[dot]com for a promotional discount!
This course will enable students how to extract and convert patient specific anatomy to 3D Models using open source segmentation softwares.
Students will learn the basics of Radiology and how to read DICOM data to differentiate different anatomies.

items.title: Animate Explainer Videos From Storyboard to Animation
items.headline: Learn how to animate explainer videos with motion graphics techniques from scratch.
objectives_summary: Animate stunning motion graphics videos on your own
Improve your animation with animation principles and curves
Understand the basics of After Effects

items.title: Blender School
items.headline: 3D Modeling and Animation
objectives_summary: User Interface, Navigation and more
Modeling Fundamentals
Shading Fundamentals

items.title: Create Animated Explainer Videos with PowToon
items.headline: Learn how to use PowToon to Produce Explainer Videos that highlight your topic, brand, product, or ideas.
objectives_summary: Learn how to use PowToon to create Explainer Videos
Understand Good Design Practices when creating Animations
Promote or Explain your Business, Product, Service or Topic in a more engaging way

items.title: Learn Blender 3D  - Become a 3D artist today
items.headline: Learn the basics and beyond of modelling, texturing, rendering and animation using Blender3D
objectives_summary: Understand all major aspects of Blender from modelling to animation and begin creating their own projects.
Understanding the concepts of Modelling, Texture, Materials, Rigging and Animation.

items.title: Blender Character Creation Masterclass - Orc Warrior

visible_instructors.title: Victory3D LLC
visible_instructors.name: Victory3D
visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated to Transforming The Way Artists Create

items.headline: Learn the Complete Workflow of Character Creation - Sculpt, Retopo, Unwrap, Bake, Texture, Light, Render & Composite
objectives_summary: Body builder anatomy sculpting
Model complex accessories
Retopologize animation-friendly character

items.title: 3D Medical Animation in Autodesk Maya
items.headline: Learn to create biological 3D animations and problem-solve inside the industry standard software for 3D animation
objectives_summary: You will be able to create biologically accurate 3D representations.
Have a great understanding of problem-solving in Autodesk Maya
Use nParticles to create blood flow

items.title: RealFlow 10 lessons
items.headline: Collection of video tutorials on creating dynamics and fluid simulation.
objectives_summary: Learn to work in the best fluid simulation program — RealFlow
Learn basics of fluid simulations theory
Know about main parameters and settings

items.title: Autodesk Inventor: The Basics
items.headline: Learn the necessary skills to start using Inventor to create anything
objectives_summary: Create Parts in Autodesk Inventor
Create Mechanical Assemblies
Render Images of Designs

items.title: Video Transitions in After Effects. After Effects Template

visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach
visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor

items.headline: Design video transitions in After Effects. Create and package After Effects templates for sale or use.
objectives_summary: Create several interesting transitions in After Effects
Build re-usable and sellable After Effects project files
Learn essential techniques in After Effects CS6, CC, CC 2015
